# pdfView

**Instance Property**

Returns the `PDFView` object associated with the thumbnail view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var pdfView: PDFView? { get set }
```

## Return Value

The PDF view object associated with the thumbnail view.
title: pdfView
